StringTable.String: Despite our best efforts, others often come into possession of various bits of money. By giving them a place to trade, we can boost their productivity, improving manufacturing and research.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoAnthropology_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Anthropology

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoAnthropology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of the Xeno Anthropology Center.

StringTable.Label: MasterXenoAnthropology_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying the natives of this universe, we are able to better interact with them. It also allows us to educate them in the proper way of doing things, our way.

StringTable.Label: MasterUniversalOutreach_Name
StringTable.String: Universal Outreach

StringTable.Label: MasterUniversalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of the Universal Outreach Center.

StringTable.Label: MasterUniversalOutreach_Dec
StringTable.String: We have mastered the ways of this Universe. Now we can use our knowledge to better interact with the natives, further spreading our influence in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: MasterFutureStudies_Name
StringTable.String: Future Studies

StringTable.Label: MasterFutureStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the creation of the Future Studies Center.

StringTable.Label: MasterFutureStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: By studying what we know of the future, we are able to influence the fate of this dimension.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Marketing_Name
StringTable.String: Marketing

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Marketing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Income of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Marketing_Dec
StringTable.String: Our storefronts and marketplaces are more than just a place to earn a profit, although they certainly do that. They also serve as the public face of our company, the truest representation of what we are, and help spread our influence in the marketplace.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MarketingMasters_Name
StringTable.String: Marketing Masters

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MarketingMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Income of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MarketingMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Throughout the galaxy, sentient life talks of the marvels present in an Iridium World complex. Providing the ultimate consumption experience, Iridium Worlds boost the economy of their host worlds like few other structures.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathofShadows_Name
StringTable.String: The Path of Shadows

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathofShadows_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Shadow Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterThePathofShadows_Dec
StringTable.String: There have always been those who cannot find the Path, and even some who threaten its existence. To combat these influences, the Krynniac faith has established the Path of Shadows, whose followers preserve the prosperity of the Krynn in their own way.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowEnforcers_Name
StringTable.String: Shadow Enforcers

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowEnforcers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Enforcement Temple.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowEnforcers_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path does not permit exploitation without authorization. Authorization granted to those that walk the Path of Shadows, who are free to collect tithes from devoted merchants and bankers to ensure their businesses suffer no misfortunes.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Shadow Trade

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Income of trade routes, by allowing the trade of dubious goods.

StringTable.Label: MasterShadowTrade_Dec
StringTable.String: The Path of Shadows teaches that unbelievers will destroy themselves if given what they want most. Properly equipped with the right "merchandise," our traders can now profit from their customers' gluttony.

StringTable.Label: MasterKrynnConversionTech_Name
StringTable.String: Krynniac Conversion

StringTable.Label: MasterKrynnConversionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase tourism income and influence on all our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterKrynnConversionTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of tourism is finally paying dividends. All who visit our worlds find themselves filled with the urge to return home and extol the virtues of the Path to their own kind.

StringTable.Label: Master_Dec
StringTable.String: c

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ProcessorUpgrades_Name
StringTable.String: Processor Upgrades

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ProcessorUpgrades_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Intelligence of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ProcessorUpgrades_Dec
StringTable.String: Unbound by the limitations of flesh a technology can improve all of our citizens at once.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PredictiveProcessors_Name
StringTable.String: Predictive Processors

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PredictiveProcessors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Intelligence of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PredictiveProcessors_Dec
StringTable.String: Unbound by the limitations of flesh a technology can improve all of our citizens at once.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ReinforcedCore_Name
StringTable.String: Reinforced Core

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ReinforcedCore_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Diligence of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ReinforcedCore_Dec
StringTable.String: We have improved the design of our citizens. And we can upgrade our current citizens to the improved design.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AmbientEnergy_Name
StringTable.String: Ambient Energy

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AmbientEnergy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Diligence of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AmbientEnergy_Dec
StringTable.String: By drawing on the energy of the universe our citizens reduce their need for rest.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Starbases_Name
StringTable.String: Starbases

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Starbases_ShortDec
StringTable.String:
Allows us to start building Starbases.
Provides two free [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Starbases_Dec
StringTable.String: No mere outpost in orbit, a starbase is an extension of our very civilization, containing everything that makes us who we are. Including, not incidentally, our incredible defensive and ship-building capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ModuleAssembly_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Modules

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ModuleAssembly_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to start building Modules in our Shipyards.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ModuleAssembly_Dec
StringTable.String: Starbases are upgraded through modules. This technology allows our shipyards to produce those modules which can then be added to a selected Starbase.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarbaseRefinery_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Refinery

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarbaseRefinery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the manufacturing capabilities of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarbaseRefinery_Dec
StringTable.String: The reach of our civilization is ultimately limited by fuel. We will dramatically improve that reach if we can begin refining that fuel further up the gravity well.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarbaseComStack_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Com Stack

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarbaseComStack_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the manufacturing capabilities of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarbaseComStack_Dec
StringTable.String: Few people consider the sheer amount of communications and logistical coordination required to maintain our civilization as it spread across the stars. This improved communications stack will make all that work far easier.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarbaseDefenseGrid_Name
StringTable.String: Starbase Defense Grid

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarbaseDefenseGrid_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves the manufacturing capabilities of our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StarbaseDefenseGrid_Dec
StringTable.String: A starbase provides the perfect anchor for our orbital defense efforts, both weapons platform and a communications hub. With a dedicated defense grid, it will become a formidable barrier for anyone who might try to do harm upon our people.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MiningMissions_Name
StringTable.String: Mining Missions

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MiningMissions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Hire civilians to gather resources for us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MiningMissions_Dec
StringTable.String: The raw resources we need for ships, starbases, and everything in between are out there. We just need to find them. This mission will redouble our efforts to do just that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMineralMissions_Name
StringTable.String: Exotic Mineral Missions

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMineralMissions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Hire civilians to gather resources for us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMineralMissions_Dec
StringTable.String: No matter what manufacturing process we examine, the same minerals show up time and time again as bottlenecks in our production capacity. This mission will help us find more of these crucial and exotic resources.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RareCrystalMissions_Name
StringTable.String: Rare Crystal Missions

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RareCrystalMissions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Hire civilians to gather resources for us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RareCrystalMissions_Dec
StringTable.String: An ever increasing amount of our civilization's wealth, happiness, and prosperity is dependent on exotic reactions modulated by rare crystals. We will redouble our effort to find these precious things.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalOutreachMissions_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Outreach Missions

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalOutreachMissions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Hire civilians to spread our message.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CulturalOutreachMissions_Dec
StringTable.String: We shall take the best of our culture, or at least the most marketable parts of it, and show them to our neighbors. And they will love us for it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidMining_Name
StringTable.String: Asteroid Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String:
Allows us to start building Asteroid Miners that boost our world's manufacturing.
Provides two free [HS=HS_AsteroidMiner]Asteroid Miners[/HS].

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Anyone with a spaceship and bad piloting skills can smash a rock. But it takes careful planning and skill to actually extract useful resources from them.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AnomalyDetection_Name
StringTable.String: Anomaly Detection

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AnomalyDetection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Discover new anomalies in the universe.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AnomalyDetection_Dec
StringTable.String: The discovery of a fresh anomaly is one of the most exciting and pivotal moments a civilization can experience. We should redouble our efforts to find more of these boons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtificialGravity_Name
StringTable.String: Artificial Gravity

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtificialGravity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases movement speed by 1.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArtificialGravity_Dec
StringTable.String: Strictly speaking, we are not able to generate gravity so much as we able to channel it. But if we do channel it, we can make off world living much safer and more productive.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperdriveOptomization_Name
StringTable.String: Hyperdrive Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperdriveOptomization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the Moves of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperdriveOptomization_Dec
StringTable.String: It's not enough to travel faster than light, not any longer. We need to go farther, faster. And with these latest proposed adjustments to our hyperdrives, we should be able to do just that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WarpTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Warp Theory

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WarpTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the Moves of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WarpTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Having observed the effects of hyperdrive for some time now, our physicists believe a new, more advanced form of propulsion can be developed based on a principal of nested hyperspace bubbles in a system they call 'warping.'

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SlipstreamDrive_Name
StringTable.String: Slipstream Drive

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SlipstreamDrive_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the Moves of our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SlipstreamDrive_Dec
StringTable.String: It's long been understood that an object traveling at warp experiences less drag when traveling in the wake of another. But a new drive may soon make it possible for a vessel to effectively travel in its own wake.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceScanning_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Scanning

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceScanning_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to detect Subspace Streams.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceScanning_Dec
StringTable.String: A systematic approach is needed when scanning, but the practice is considerably harder in subspace, where basic notions of distance and rotation aren't of much use. A new form of math is required.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceStreaming_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Streaming

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceStreaming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows travel across Subspace Streams.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceStreaming_Dec
StringTable.String: Within the fabric of subspace are certain 'channels' where information seems to flow more readily. By coaxing our sensors to mimic this behavior, we should be able to dramatically increase their efficiency.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepFieldSensors_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Field Sensors

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepFieldSensors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks a wonder that will discover other civilizations.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepFieldSensors_Dec
StringTable.String: Deep Field Sensors operate by extending quantum uncertainty principles into the realm of subspace. Basically, by observing hypothetical observers who are in turn observing very real things, we can infer much about objects at greater distances than we could before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceProjection_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Projection

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds the most advanced sensors to our starbases.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceProjection_Dec
StringTable.String: One limit of our existing sensor technology is how infuriatingly complicated it all is, requiring great deals of processing power to make sense of any of it. A new breakthrough in visualization will allow users to simply project their sense of perception, allowing us to see far more clearly at the extremes our technology can reach.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumStreamTunneling_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Stream Tunneling

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumStreamTunneling_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reveal the most well hidden anomalies.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumStreamTunneling_Dec
StringTable.String: The various quantum effects and entanglements our sensor technology relies on do not occur at random, but via distinct patterns we can now finally discern. Our latest sensors will use this breakthrough to effectively tunnel through reality at unimaginable speeds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedLifeSupport_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Life Support

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range we can travel out into space.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedLifeSupport_Dec
StringTable.String: There's little point to building ships to go places if we can't keep our people alive when they get there. These new life support systems will increase the operating range of our ships substantially.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FleetResupplyDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Fleet Resupply Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FleetResupplyDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the maximum size of our fleets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FleetResupplyDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: A fleet based approach to resupply stops treating our space vessels as individuals but as components of a single entity. This enables economies of scale which will improve our resupply efforts and extend the effective range of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarResupplyDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Resupply Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarResupplyDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the maximum size of our fleets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InterstellarResupplyDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Rather than the fixed boundaries we've been working with, the Interstellar Resupply Doctrine uses a more subtle and refined system of 'hand-offs' between different resupply hubs which should lead to substantial improvements in fleet range.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_IntermittentSuspension_Name
StringTable.String: Intermittent Suspension

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_IntermittentSuspension_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the maximum size of our fleets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_IntermittentSuspension_Dec
StringTable.String: A full cryogenic cycle is too slow to be of use for the crew of most ships. But this new system of Intermittent Suspension will allow ships to 'stow' their crews when not in use and spin them up only when needed, which should save on resources, and ultimately increase our fleets' range.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticResupplyDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Resupply Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticResupplyDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the maximum size of our fleets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GalacticResupplyDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: We no longer need to rely on static hubs for resupplying our vessels, and can now make use of constantly moving resupply fleets of both piloted and semi-autonomous drones, always available where they're needed most.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalManufacturing_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks [HS=HS_HullSize]Small[/HS] hulled ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalManufacturing_Dec
StringTable.String: Moving our manufacturing operations to micro-gravity environments will eventually allow for the construction of massive structures in space. We're not there yet, but this first step was always going to be the biggest.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalRepair_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Repair

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalRepair_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks Caretaker ships which can repair our fleets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalRepair_Dec
StringTable.String: No longer restricted to the combined action of independent crews, we now have entire facilities in orbit capable of manufacturing ships, with swarms of production crews producing vessels faster than ever before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalShipAssembly_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Ship Assembly

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalShipAssembly_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks [HS=HS_HullSize]Medium[/HS] hulled ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalShipAssembly_Dec
StringTable.String: Unlike manufacturing, the repair of spaceships requires a degree of flexibility and problem solving, intuiting what to salvage and what to cut. Less a new technology, and more the work of countless steps of trial and error, we have now become masters of orbital repair.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedComposites_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Composites

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedComposites_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the capabilities of our shipyards.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedComposites_Dec
StringTable.String: This new family of materials, made possible by a breakthrough in materials science, will enable us to build stronger, tougher, and better looking vessels than ever before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LargeHullAssembly_Name
StringTable.String: Large Hull Assembly

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LargeHullAssembly_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks [HS=HS_HullSize]Large[/HS] hulled ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LargeHullAssembly_Dec
StringTable.String: Making ships larger is more involved than just adding stuff to them. Ensuring that they don't collapse under acceleration is the real challenge, but it's an effort that does go appreciated by our crews.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalDeploymentMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Orbital Deployment Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalDeploymentMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the capabilities of our shipyards.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrbitalDeploymentMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: For some time now the main barrier to building larger ships was a matter of logistics, of getting all the necessary materials, people, and equipment into the right place at the right time. We're doing this better than ever, and our ships will grow ever larger for it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceFieldCreation_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Field Creation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceFieldCreation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the capabilities of our shipyards.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SubspaceFieldCreation_Dec
StringTable.String: There are limits to what even the strongest materials can withstand, but if we augment the structure of our ships with subspace fields, we can engineer craft almost unimaginably large.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MassiveHullConstruction_Name
StringTable.String: Massive Hull Construction

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MassiveHullConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks [HS=HS_HullSize]Huge[/HS] hulled ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MassiveHullConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: We're now building ships capable of blotting out the stars. We haven't built one larger than a star yet, but at this point that seems like only a matter of time.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WeakAI_Name
StringTable.String: Weak AI

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WeakAI_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the research of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_WeakAI_Dec
StringTable.String: True artificial intelligence is difficult to achieve, being both loosely defined, and computationally expensive no matter what definition is used. But this latest advancement, using pseudo-synaptic pattern recognition circuits, is a big step, and should greatly boost our research ability.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DroneProduction_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Production

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DroneProduction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to begin constructing Drones.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DroneProduction_Dec
StringTable.String: We've used various forms of automation in our production processes since long before we reached the stars. But this latest advancement increases the amount of autonomy these devices can have, creating fleets of drones that will massively increase our production capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CollectorDrones_Name
StringTable.String: Collector Drones

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CollectorDrones_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the production supplied by our Asteroid Miners.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CollectorDrones_Dec
StringTable.String: Although our resource collection has long relied on remote tools, sentient operators have never been far from the controls. The latest advancement in autonomous collection drones should lead to a massive increase in our harvesting capacity.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidFactories_Name
StringTable.String: Asteroid Factories

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidFactories_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the production supplied by our Asteroid Miners.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AsteroidFactories_Dec
StringTable.String: A surprising amount of time in the resource collection process is simply dedicated to finding secure footholds for mining platforms to situate themselves. Fixed, semi-permanent factories on the surface of asteroids will enable resource collection on a whole new scale.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ResourceExtractionDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Resource Extraction Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ResourceExtractionDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our mining efforts.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ResourceExtractionDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: The Resource Extraction Doctrine is a systematic approach to resource management on a galactic scale. Guided by a predictive intelligence which monitors our production needs and supply chains, we harvest resources more efficiently and effectively than ever before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LosslessMining_Name
StringTable.String: Lossless Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_LosslessMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Our mastery of resource extraction at the macro level has now been matched at the subatomic level. No more will resources be discarded for being difficult to extract. We have achieved a nearly perfect mining efficiency.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DurantiumExtractors_Name
StringTable.String: Durantium Extractors

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DurantiumExtractors_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to mine more Durantium.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DurantiumExtractors_Dec
StringTable.String: The valuable metal Durantium has long been difficult to harvest cleanly from its natural ores. These new extractors, built specifically to match the exacting process required, should improve our Durantium extracting efficiency greatly.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PromethionExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Promethion Extraction

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PromethionExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to mine more Promethion.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PromethionExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: The rare mineral Promethion, now so valuable to our production, has long been collected almost by accident. A new type of extraction drone should substantially improve the odds of these happy accidents occurring.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMatterExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Antimatter Extraction

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMatterExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to mine more Antimatter.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMatterExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Collecting antimatter is a highly specialized process which our standard collection drones are ill-equipped to handle. This new dedicated breed should prove far more effective, or at least not blow themselves up nearly as much.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ThuliumExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Thulium Extraction

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ThuliumExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to mine more Thulium.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ThuliumExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Thulium requires a precise combination of quantum effects to separate from the minerals it's commonly found in, which can only be done at great energy and cost. A new chain of effects has been discovered which should make this process far more efficient.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EleriumExtraction_Name
StringTable.String: Elerium Extraction

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EleriumExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to mine more Elerium.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EleriumExtraction_Dec
StringTable.String: Elerium is as elusive as it is powerful. Mining it isn't difficult, the hard part is trapping it before it dissipates.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SupplyDrones_Name
StringTable.String: Supply Drones

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SupplyDrones_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to produce nanobots that can upgrade our colonies.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SupplyDrones_Dec
StringTable.String: These new drones, capable of navigating interstellar space autonomously, will provide our fleet resupply network a new degree of flexibility and effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ConstructionDrones_Name
StringTable.String: Construction Drones

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ConstructionDrones_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to upgrade our ships with repair drones that service the entire fleet.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ConstructionDrones_Dec
StringTable.String: Construction is one of the tasks best suited for drone-based automation, but the sheer scale of it has limited our use of the technology until now. These new construction drones should make a massive difference.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShipUpgradeDrones_Name
StringTable.String: Ship Upgrade Drones

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShipUpgradeDrones_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks new upgrades for our Ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShipUpgradeDrones_Dec
StringTable.String: Working in and upgrading a completed vessel requires a degree of flexibility and precision which has generally limited it to skilled craftsmen until now. These new ship upgrade drones will easily allow us to keep our entire fleet equipped with our most cutting edge technology.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_UtilityClouds_Name
StringTable.String: Utility Clouds

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_UtilityClouds_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks new upgrades for our Ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_UtilityClouds_Dec
StringTable.String: A general purpose drone is easier said than done, the sheer variety of activities we require of drones making the amount of equipment one would need to carry impractical. But by making drones reconfigurable - by other drones themselves - a cloud of drones can genuinely serve almost any purpose we can imagine.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepCoreMining_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Core Mining

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepCoreMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us access to buried minerals and wealth, if we can handle the pollution generated.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepCoreMining_Dec
StringTable.String: Our planetary resource extraction has long been limited to the mere crust of the bodies we inhabit. No longer. Deep core mining will enable us to extract resources at rates we have never seen before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MolecularPrinters_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Printers

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MolecularPrinters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks new upgrades for our Ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MolecularPrinters_Dec
StringTable.String: Recent advances in materials science has enabled the construction of space elevators, which will allow us to move material into space much easier, and from there throughout our civilization.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicAnalytics_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Analytics

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicAnalytics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves relic benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicAnalytics_Dec
StringTable.String: We've been finding relics left behind by an ancient race known as the Precursors for some time now, discoveries which have led to incredible breakthroughs in a variety of fields. A more focused effort to analyze these relics should tease out even more useful details.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoComputationalTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Xeno Computational Theory

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoComputationalTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves global Research.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_XenoComputationalTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Our previous efforts to analyze Precursor artifacts has been limited by just how different these beings thought from us. A new form of computer, tuned to emulate the strange patterns the Precursors used, should help increase our research effectiveness.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicProficiency_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Proficiency

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicProficiency_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves relic benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicProficiency_Dec
StringTable.String: We've studied Precursor relics so long now that the introduction of a new one is no longer a great mystery, but a routine event. Test procedures, harnesses, and energy sources have all been refined to the point that the Precursors spill their secrets to us with incredible ease.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StrongAI_Name
StringTable.String: Strong AI

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StrongAI_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to simulate our brightest minds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StrongAI_Dec
StringTable.String: The latest breakthrough in AI has enabled our learning systems to form new pathways at a nearly geometric rate, leading to the first emergence of truly strong AI. The impact this will have on our research programs will be immense.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Relic Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves relic benefits.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecursorRelicMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We now think and perceive the universe at nearly the same level as the Precursors once did themselves. Were they to meet us, they might very well consider us their peers.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DriveOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Drive System Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DriveOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boosts the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DriveOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: With a little persuasion, we have been able to convince many of our researchers leave there cozy research centers and do some practical studies, onboard our ships. The result has been an impressive increase of our average ship speeds. Unfortunate the researchers will need to return to their offices before too long, unless we continue to fund this endeavor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Name
StringTable.String: Armed Shuttles

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_ShortDec
StringTable.String:
Allows construction of armed spacecraft.
Provides two free warships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Dec
StringTable.String: Space ships are fragile things, and it's no great feat destroying them. The real art is destroying the enemy before they do you. New equipment will be required if we hope to come out on the right side of that calculation more often.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Theory

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic laser systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Beam weapons will deliver our will upon enemies at the speed of light. But to make them feasible at ship scales we will require energy supplies, capacitors, collimation systems, and a variety of other related technologies. We will establish a dedicated field of research to begin tackling these challenges.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceLasers_Name
StringTable.String: Space Lasers

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceLasers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceLasers_Dec
StringTable.String: Lasers are our oldest forms of beam technology, having long been present in research and industrial settings. Transferring them to space based platforms should be straightforward, it's just a matter of scale.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ForgedBeamWeapons_Name
StringTable.String: Forged Beam Weapons

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ForgedBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ForgedBeamWeapons_Dec
StringTable.String: A new process has been discovered which is capable of manufacturing the focusing crystals used in beam systems with a precision we've never seen before. These forged systems should prove far more potent than previous models.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponMiniturization_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponMiniturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponMiniturization_Dec
StringTable.String: Breakthroughs in capacitor design have enabled us to create beam systems in a much smaller form factor than we could before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamWeaponAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: By channeling the initial wave of energy we supply to a beam system through a feedback loop, synchronizing its exit from that loop with the arrival of the next wave, we can deliver far more powerful bursts of energy. This augmentation system should make all our beam weapons more potent.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DisruptorBeams_Name
StringTable.String: Disruptor Beams

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DisruptorBeams_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DisruptorBeams_Dec
StringTable.String: Disruptor system rely on the sudden delivery of a specific combination of subatomic particles, which, when delivered at a high enough energy, disrupt the electromagnetic force holding matter together. Nasty stuff. Let's be careful who we point these at.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighEnergyTransfer_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Transfer

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighEnergyTransfer_Dec
StringTable.String: One of the primary bottlenecks in our beam weapon systems is the ability to rapidly direct energy from our generating systems to the weapons themselves. A new form of superconductor should enable far greater energy velocities than we've seen before.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamIntegrityEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Weapon Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamIntegrityEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamIntegrityEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: We've noticed that even the smallest of vibrations can disrupt the focusing of a beam weapon enough to reduce damage output. Improved dampening systems to isolate our beam weapons from the ship or weapons platform should correct this inefficiency.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlasmaBeams_Name
StringTable.String: Plasma Beams

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlasmaBeams_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlasmaBeams_Dec
StringTable.String: A new breakthrough has allowed us to accelerate small particles at incredible speeds. Although not strictly light speed, the difference is small enough to have no tactical effect, and the sheer weight of these particles, to say nothing of their enormous temperature, should ensure anyone on the receiving end will have a very bad day.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighEnergyPlasmas_Name
StringTable.String: High Energy Plasmas

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighEnergyPlasmas_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HighEnergyPlasmas_Dec
StringTable.String: It was only natural that it would take a couple generations of our plasma systems to work the kinks out. But now, all of our battlefield research has paid off with the delivery of these new, higher energy plasma weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamCapacitation_Name
StringTable.String: Beam Capacitation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamCapacitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BeamCapacitation_Dec
StringTable.String: Why have we spent so much time trying to store energy for beam weapons in our dimension, when there's entire other planes nearby? By using their capacity for energy storage, tapped at the right time, we can deliver vastly greater sums of energy upon our foes.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasorBeams_Name
StringTable.String: Phasor Beams

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasorBeams_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasorBeams_Dec
StringTable.String: Much in the same way we can now store energy for our weapons systems in neighboring realities, we could potentially begin sending small parts of our enemies to those realities as well. Not all the parts though, indeed, we should scatter them amongst a few dimensions if possible.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasedEnergyMagnification_Name
StringTable.String: Phased Energy Magnification

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasedEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhasedEnergyMagnification_Dec
StringTable.String: The particles used by our phasor systems have resisted most of our attempts to corral more of them, being not entirely of this universe. We're having to build parallel systems in neighboring dimensions to achieve the energy densities we really want.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DoomRay_Name
StringTable.String: Doom Ray

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DoomRay_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DoomRay_Dec
StringTable.String: A 'polyphasic decoherence effect generator', while being perhaps a more accurate name, does not have the same emotional effect as 'Doom Ray.' We think our enemies will appreciate the difference.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ThermalBlooming_Name
StringTable.String: Thermal Blooming

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ThermalBlooming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ThermalBlooming_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that our beam weapons spend so much of their time in neighboring dimensions, it should have been no surprise they'd suffer from an effect similar to the thermal blooming we observe when they're fired in atmospheres. But now we can control this effect. We can channel the energy lost back into the main flow.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Railguns_Name
StringTable.String: Railguns

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Railguns_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic Kinetic weapon.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Railguns_Dec
StringTable.String: Railguns use arrays of magnets to accelerate projectiles to terrifying velocities, all without any of the hassle or inherent danger of handling explosive propellants.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: Our material scientists have devised a new alloy with far greater potential for use in electromagnets. When installed in our kinetic weapon systems, it should lead to a very noticeable increase in other things exploding downrange from our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponTargeting_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Targeting

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponTargeting_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponTargeting_Dec
StringTable.String: Kinetic weapons travel quickly, but not instantly. Improved targeting systems should help ensure they deliver their destructive energy to the places it will do the most... not good. The most bad.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticDischargeMiniaturization_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Discharge Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticDischargeMiniaturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticDischargeMiniaturization_Dec
StringTable.String: A new winding arrangement on our kinetic weapon coils makes use of interference effects to deliver the same amount of magnetic thrust to a projectile within a smaller package.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Improved reload and recharge mechanisms will allow our weapon systems to fire more projectiles in a shorter time span than before, increasing damage per second and general misery amongst our foes.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PulseCannons_Name
StringTable.String: Pulse Cannons

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PulseCannons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PulseCannons_Dec
StringTable.String: There's little difference between a projectile and the same mass of particles walloping into the side of an enemy ship at high velocity. And yet due to some newly discovered quantum effects, we should now be capable of launching those clouds of particles with far greater ease, and consequently, at much higher volume.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperFieldMassDrivers_Name
StringTable.String: Hyper Field Mass Drivers

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperFieldMassDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_HyperFieldMassDrivers_Dec
StringTable.String: We've finally found a way to use the same principles behind the notion of hyperdrive to accelerate projectiles, using elongated hyper fields to allow our projectiles to travel in compressed space and reach incredible velocities.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedKineticWeaponDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Kinetic Weapon Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedKineticWeaponDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedKineticWeaponDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Kinetic weapons require more than just equipment. They require a whole new way of practicing warfare, everything from the tactics, targeting, and ship maneuvers needing to be adjusted to suit this new means of destruction.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravitonGuns_Name
StringTable.String: Graviton Guns

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravitonGuns_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravitonGuns_Dec
StringTable.String: Gravitons simply don't interact with our conventional kinetic pulse cannons - it took parallel breakthroughs in particle science and cosmology to devise a mechanism for even manipulating them. But now that we can, we can fire charges at our enemies that will literally tear them apart from the inside.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMassWeaponry_Name
StringTable.String: Exotic Mass Weaponry

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMassWeaponry_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticMassWeaponry_Dec
StringTable.String: Kinetic weapons have generally resisted our attempts to employ explosive projectiles, given the tremendous energies the projectiles experience within our weapons themselves. It's taken a new form of exotic material to make this breakthrough, delivering projectiles with latent explosive energy 'baked' in.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InertiaEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Inertia Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InertiaEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InertiaEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: A new form of projectile, one which keeps much of its mass in a neighboring dimension, will allow us to fire relatively light rounds at incredible speeds, which only bring their full mass to bear on impact.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumPulseDriver_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Pulse Driver

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumPulseDriver_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumPulseDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Our latest form of kinetic weapon uses specially entangled quantum particles, which upon impact, 'swap' small parts of our target with each other. In short, they cause utter chaos at a molecular level, which no armor can hope to withstand.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Kinetic Weapon Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_KineticWeaponMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: No single breakthrough, but a simple reflection of the amount of effort we've invested in kinetic weapon systems. We have mastered the targeting, tactics, manufacturing, operations, and charging systems needed to make first class kinetic weapons, having wrung efficiencies out of every possible system.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BlackholeGun_Name
StringTable.String: Blackhole Gun

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BlackholeGun_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_BlackholeGun_Dec
StringTable.String: The Blackhole Gun is not a misnomer or colorful exaggeration. It's a gun which fires blackholes. The blackholes are very small, to be fair, we're not reckless. But they are real, and if we don't like you, they are coming your way.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MassManipulation_Name
StringTable.String: Mass Manipulation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MassManipulation_Dec
StringTable.String: A breakthrough in particle sciences has enabled us to fire particles which are technically massless, at least until a quantum chain reaction decays to a certain point. By mixing these particles with conventional matter, we can fire practically wafer thin projectiles which become far heavier on the way to their target.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AvengerMissileSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Avenger Missile System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AvengerMissileSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AvengerMissileSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Missile systems enable on the fly targeting adjustments, rendering most forms of evasive maneuver pointless. This new Avenger system will show how dangerous and flexible missile warfare can be.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileTargeting_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Missile Targeting

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileTargeting_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileTargeting_Dec
StringTable.String: The whole point of missiles is their ability to adjust their course, hitting their targets no matter what. And yet they miss disappointingly often. We should dedicate more resources to improving their targeting systems.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissilePayloadOptimization_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Payload Optimization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissilePayloadOptimization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissilePayloadOptimization_Dec
StringTable.String: Shaped explosives are not new technology to us, but it will take some experimentation to figure out the best way to apply this technique to best destroy spaceships. Poorly designed, they'll waste much of their energy out the backside of their targets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileWarfareDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Missile Warfare Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileWarfareDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileWarfareDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: There are distinct movement and maneuvers and tactics unique to missile warfare that we need to train our ship commanders on. Range management and flocking behavior alone could fill textbooks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PayloadMiniaturization_Name
StringTable.String: Payload Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PayloadMiniaturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PayloadMiniaturization_Dec
StringTable.String: It's a simple calculation. If we can deliver the same amount of destructive potential in a smaller missile, we can carry more of them. Or, other equipment, we suppose.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DevastatorMissileSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Devastator Missile System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DevastatorMissileSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DevastatorMissileSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Devastator missile system uses a new form of micro-fusion warhead which will enable us to increase both the destructive power of our own ships and general enemy unhappiness by vast amounts.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveMissileSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Missile System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveMissileSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveMissileSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Adaptive Missile System uses targeting information from peer missiles to inform decision making both by the current flock of missiles, and also later salvos.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileProduction_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Missile Production

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileProduction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileProduction_Dec
StringTable.String: Our missile systems work best when fired in volume. Anything we can do on the supply side to make missiles cheaper, will ensure that volume is present at the moment of truth.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhotonicWarheadSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Photonic Warhead System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhotonicWarheadSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhotonicWarheadSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Photonic Warheads release terrifically high energy photons on impact, far beyond what are released by mere fusion reactions. Our scientists are a little shaky on the details, but that hasn't stopped them on turning it into a weapon.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntimatterDetonation_Name
StringTable.String: Antimatter Detonation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntimatterDetonation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntimatterDetonation_Dec
StringTable.String: By embedding true AI in our missile systems, our missiles will be more adaptable and should prove far more successful at evading enemy countermeasures or tracking evasion maneuvers.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedMissileDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Advanced Missile Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedMissileDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdvancedMissileDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Every missile fired has an envelope in which it can effectively strike its target. The overlap of these envelopes, and the effect they have on enemy maneuvers is a fantastically complicated problem, but if we master it, we may be able to coax our enemy to literally fly into our missiles for us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumTorpedoSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Torpedo System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumTorpedoSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_QuantumTorpedoSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The effects a quantum torpedo has upon impact are, by definition, a bit unpredictable. Parts of the enemy ship don't exist any more, or exist in a pretty bad place at the very least.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissileWarfareMastery_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Warfare Mastery

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissileWarfareMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissileWarfareMastery_Dec
StringTable.String: We have done it. We've wrung every efficiency possible out of our missile systems, tuned these weapons to the very limit of their potential. Our ships can fill entire systems with missiles, raining destruction on anyone they choose.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NightmareMissileSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Nightmare Missile System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NightmareMissileSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NightmareMissileSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: The Nightmare Missile uses a pair of rapidly orbiting singularities, stable in storage and flight, but abruptly less so upon impact. The effect two unbalanced singularities can have on an enemy ships is grave indeed. Also we usually fire more than one of these missiles at a time.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CascadingDetonations_Name
StringTable.String: Cascading Detonations

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CascadingDetonations_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the power of our Missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CascadingDetonations_Dec
StringTable.String: Cascading warheads don't just explode, they induce small fusion reactions in the enemy armor itself, causing chain reactions for several very exciting seconds after impact.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DefensiveStudies_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Studies

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DefensiveStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to begin building advanced systems into our most vulnerable targets.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DefensiveStudies_Dec
StringTable.String: Spaceships are fragile things, with little hope to standing up to even the current level of weapons technology. We should devise new systems which will give our ships a fighting chance of surviving encounters with hostile forces.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDefenseTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Defense Theory

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDefenseTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advanced Armor will protect our ships from Kinetic attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDefenseTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Armor is the most conceptually straightforward of defensive systems, but in that simplicity lies many intricacies we will need to master. We can't simply strap weight onto to our ships without compromising their effectiveness. A more subtle solution is needed.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedArmorScience_Name
StringTable.String: Improved Armor Science

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedArmorScience_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ImprovedArmorScience_Dec
StringTable.String: By dedicating resources to material sciences and fabrication, we should be able to build denser, more resilient armor systems, and consequently, denser, more resilient spaceships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorMaterialScience_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Material Science

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorMaterialScience_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorMaterialScience_Dec
StringTable.String: Our scientists in other fields, particularly particle physics and planetology, regularly devise or stumble upon new materials that have potential as armoring substances. We should establish information sharing regimes so that their breakthroughs become ours.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DiamonicArmorComposite_Name
StringTable.String: Diamonic Armor Composite

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DiamonicArmorComposite_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DiamonicArmorComposite_Dec
StringTable.String: Diamond, while very hard, is horrifically expensive, and prone to fracturing, But by establishing layered composites of diamond and conventional armor plating, we can produce a material that's both extraordinarily resilient and feasible to manufacture in volume.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SelfHealingArmor_Name
StringTable.String: Self-Healing Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SelfHealingArmor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SelfHealingArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: During an impact, the physical material of armor doesn't go anywhere, it's just distorted into a shape that makes it far less effective. By using a new breed of fusible alloys within our plating, we can cause these holes and tears to restore themselves using the latent heat energy of the impact itself.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDensityImprovements_Name
StringTable.String: Armor Density Improvements

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDensityImprovements_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmorDensityImprovements_Dec
StringTable.String: To date, the density of a material has always been intrinsic to it, a fact of the universe unchangeable by us. But thanks to the discovery of a new field which is capable of reducing intra-atomic distances, all of our materials can be made denser, and thus hardier. We're literally improving the universe here.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrganicArmor_Name
StringTable.String: Organic Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrganicArmor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_OrganicArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: Carbon based molecules can be extraordinarily hard - diamond for instance. But until now, these crystalline structures only formed under intense pressures. A new form of chemistry that arranges carbon molecules in unusually dense formations can produce amazingly durable plating with incredible self healing properties.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveArmorImprovements_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptive Armor Improvements

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveArmorImprovements_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveArmorImprovements_Dec
StringTable.String: Projectiles aren't invisible - our sensors can easily see what's about to strike us. By channeling hardening fields into the areas where impacts are anticipated, we can make our armor more effectively resilient for almost no cost at all.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticArmorMaterials_Name
StringTable.String: Exotic Armor Materials

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticArmorMaterials_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExoticArmorMaterials_Dec
StringTable.String: Most materials we work with are of this universe, which is fine, just a bit boring. But there are conceivable universes where various physical constants are more conducive to armoring. Tighter packed molecules, etc. If we 'borrow' these materials for our needs, surely no-one in those other universes will mind.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NullPointArmor_Name
StringTable.String: Null Point Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NullPointArmor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_NullPointArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: By covering our armor in a layer of tightly contained artificial singularities, we can ensure any incoming projectiles are annihilated before they touch us. The handling of such materials is a little tricky, and we'll have to take care not to bump into anything, but this should all be doable.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TemperedArmor_Name
StringTable.String: Tempered Armor

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TemperedArmor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in materials technology will provide us with lighter and stronger Armor.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_TemperedArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: It's long been observed by those that repair ships that armor panels that have already taken impacts are significantly harder than their undamaged neighbors. If we can artificially induce this same effect, we should be able to create far sturdier vessels.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDeflectionTheory_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Deflection Theory

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDeflectionTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Basic shields will protect us from beam attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDeflectionTheory_Dec
StringTable.String: Directed energy beams are a potent new weapon our enemies often wield. Counteracting them will involve a new field of science using equal or greater amounts of energy arranged in defensive fields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDissipationStrategies_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Dissipation Strategies

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDissipationStrategies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By deflecting the incoming energy, our Shields have less to resist,

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyDissipationStrategies_Dec
StringTable.String: The energy our shields absorb doesn't disappear - that's impossible, or at least extremely unlikely. It has to be vented somehow, and we will need to research new technologies to do it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyShields_Name
StringTable.String: Energy Shields

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyShields_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology will provide us with stronger shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_EnergyShields_Dec
StringTable.String: While earlier models deflected incoming energy with precisely timed counterblasts, our latest deflector systems are capable of projecting entire shields around our vessels, forming the classic ship in a bubble effect we long envisioned.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldEnhancements_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Enhancements

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldEnhancements_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology will provide us with stronger shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldEnhancements_Dec
StringTable.String: By increasing the number of shield emitters we install on our ships, we can ensure no single sector is overwhelmed by incoming energy, allowing networks of shield emitters to support each other.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldRegeneration_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Regeneration

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldRegeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology will provide us with stronger shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldRegeneration_Dec
StringTable.String: The primary reason shields 'wear out' is due to energy dissipation. By dramatically increasing our dissipation networks, up to and including temporarily storing incoming energy to funnel back into our shields, we can ensure that our shields recharge faster than ever.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldAugmentation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Augmentation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology will provide us with stronger shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldAugmentation_Dec
StringTable.String: Shields to date have always been in a single layer, due to limitations in our ability to project through our own shields. But by preparing a temporary new shield ready to deploy in the space behind a shield about to fail, we can effectively defend in depth.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravimetricShields_Name
StringTable.String: Gravimetric Shields

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravimetricShields_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology will provide us with stronger shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GravimetricShields_Dec
StringTable.String: Light can be bent by gravity, this has been understood for centuries. But it's taken some time for us to be able to artificially generate gravity - albeit in a very localized way - enough to diffuse and deflect incoming energy attacks.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFrequencyModulation_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Frequency Modulation

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFrequencyModulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology will provide us with stronger shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFrequencyModulation_Dec
StringTable.String: Although it sounds like something someone just made up on the spot, Shield Frequency Modulation uses the very real science of frequencies to modulate our shields in a way which makes them more effective. Very complicated stuff.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFocusAdaption_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Focus Adaption

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFocusAdaption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology will provide us with stronger shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldFocusAdaption_Dec
StringTable.String: A shocking amount of the energy output of our shields goes to waste, directed entire arc-minutes off-axis from incoming strikes. By better tuning our shield emitters to more precisely focus on the incoming energy, we can produce stronger, more effective shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InvulnerabilityShields_Name
StringTable.String: Invulnerability Shields

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InvulnerabilityShields_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology will provide us with stronger shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_InvulnerabilityShields_Dec
StringTable.String: The Invulnerability Shield system channels nearly supernova levels of energy outwards from our ship, annihilating all but the most ferocious strikes directed our way. Perhaps not truly invulnerable, but there are few out there who can test the difference.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldHarmonics_Name
StringTable.String: Shield Harmonics

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldHarmonics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in energy technology will provide us with stronger shields.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ShieldHarmonics_Dec
StringTable.String: There are interference effects when two waves collide that our shields can take advantage of. By using very precise sensors to measure incoming energy and rapidly adapting our shield emitters, our shields should prove hardier at almost no additional cost.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissileCountermeasures_Name
StringTable.String: Missile Countermeasures

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissileCountermeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MissileCountermeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles can contain enough explosive energy and shrapnel to shred our ships. The best countermeasure will be to destroy them before they reach our ships. We should research countermeasure systems which can do just that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMissileGuidanceSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Anti-Missile Guidance System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMissileGuidanceSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMissileGuidanceSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Missiles are fragile things themselves, and can be easily destroyed if they pass through a small cloud of shrapnel. Anti-missile missile systems, which track and destroy these incoming attacks will be a great asset for our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PointDefenseSystem_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense System

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PointDefenseSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PointDefenseSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: Miniature railguns with independent tracking systems can serve as vastly more protective point defense systems than our earlier generations of interceptor missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMissileClusters_Name
StringTable.String: Anti-Missile Clusters

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMissileClusters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMissileClusters_Dec
StringTable.String: By using cluster munitions in our missile countermeasure systems, the defensive rounds they fire will be capable of filling far more space with defensive shrapnel.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CountermeasureEfficiency_Name
StringTable.String: Countermeasure Efficiency

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CountermeasureEfficiency_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CountermeasureEfficiency_Dec
StringTable.String: If our countermeasure rounds coordinated their behavior with each other - not all picking the same target for instance - they could prove far more effective. We'll need to rewrite our defensive guidance systems, but this should be within our reach.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PointDefenseArrays_Name
StringTable.String: Point Defense Arrays

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PointDefenseArrays_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PointDefenseArrays_Dec
StringTable.String: By siting our point defense cannons in coordinated batteries, we can ensure they manage their fields of fire far more effectively, and fill far greater a volume of space with defensive fire.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AIGuidedPointDefense_Name
StringTable.String: AI Guided Point Defense

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AIGuidedPointDefense_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AIGuidedPointDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: The speed of combat meant we long took the control of point defense systems out of our hands, but even our guidance systems can be improved. By installing specialized AI systems on these batteries, we can ensure they target incoming missiles with perfect efficiency.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMissileDroneSentries_Name
StringTable.String: Anti-Missile Drone Sentries

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMissileDroneSentries_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AntiMissileDroneSentries_Dec
StringTable.String: The further away we can engage incoming missiles, the better off we'll be. Drone sentries, operating at variable distances from our ships hulls, can carry all the point defense fire power of our regular systems and thus provide defense in depth.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhantomTargetEnhancement_Name
StringTable.String: Phantom Target Enhancement

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhantomTargetEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PhantomTargetEnhancement_Dec
StringTable.String: Our enemies are no fools - otherwise they wouldn't be worthy of the title. Their incoming missiles have begun to develop very advanced counter-countermeasures, casting sensor phantoms to trick our countermeasures. We'll need a new sensor system to keep on the safe side of this technological curve.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AeronMissileDefense_Name
StringTable.String: Aeron Missile Defense

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AeronMissileDefense_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_AeronMissileDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: The Aeron Missile Defense system fires defensive missiles in wildly unpredictable paths, confusing incoming missiles defensive maneuvers. Despite the seemingly random initial bursts, Aerons inexorably home in on their targets, filling the sky with explosions a safe distance from our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecisionCountermeasures_Name
StringTable.String: Precision Countermeasures

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecisionCountermeasures_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Advancements in targeting technology will improve our protection from missiles.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PrecisionCountermeasures_Dec
StringTable.String: Far too much of our countermeasure effort goes to waste. Improved targeting systems, sensors, and interceptor velocity should ensure we waste as little as our defensive firepower as possible.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Space Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A series of theories and policies that, when combined, form a cohesive strategy for fighting wars in space.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SpaceDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: Space isn't just big. It's dangerous. This is doubly true if there are aliens trying to destroy our ships. Space Doctrine sets up a department in our government designed to organize both public and private industry to work together to ensure our civilization's survival.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FlexibleBulkheads_Name
StringTable.String: Flexible Bulkheads

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FlexibleBulkheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds an additional component slot on all types of hulls.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_FlexibleBulkheads_Dec
