StringTable.String: If only we could move our bulkheads when needed to maximize space. With Flexible Bulkheads the internals of our ships are much easier to adapt for maximum storage.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExtremeMiniaturization_Name
StringTable.String: Extreme Miniaturization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExtremeMiniaturization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds additional component slots on hulls based on the mass of the hull.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ExtremeMiniaturization_Dec
StringTable.String: This poorly named set of techniques, doctrines, policies and yes, technologies is more of a policy of organizing what goes on a given ship so that we can fit much much more. Contrary to what some have argued we are not actually shrinking things inside our ships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryMobilization_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Mobilization

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryMobilization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to put our citizens to greater use.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryMobilization_Dec
StringTable.String: It won't take much to motivate our civilians to defend themselves. But it will take organizational ability, tactics, and of course equipment. Rifles and boots by the million, to start.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CentralizedAdministration_Name
StringTable.String: Centralized Administration

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CentralizedAdministration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: New tools will allow us to control our aspects of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CentralizedAdministration_Dec
StringTable.String: By centralizing our command structure for planetary defense, we can ensure our volunteer soldiers are put to the best use where they're needed most.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryInvasion_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Invasion

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to coordinate the invasion of core worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryInvasion_Dec
StringTable.String: Invading another planet is a complicated business, requiring well trained troops, dedicated equipment, and no small amount of good fortune. We should focus our efforts to making as much of those things as possible.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarMarines_Name
StringTable.String: Stellar Marines

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to invade worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarMarines_Dec
StringTable.String: Everything is more difficult on the surface of an unfamiliar world, and that includes getting shot at. We should establish a dedicated branch of the military that specializes in the dangerous art of planetary invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DroneSoldiers_Name
StringTable.String: Drone Soldiers

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to invade worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DroneSoldiers_Dec
StringTable.String: Drone soldiers know no fear, can coordinate perfectly across massive theaters, and be deployed using tactics that don't have to have any particular regard for their safety. They lack the personal touch, but that's a small thing, we can probably work on that.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Killbots_Name
StringTable.String: Killbots

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Killbots_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to invade worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Killbots_Dec
StringTable.String: While our initial attempts at drone soldiers were effective, they lacked a certain charm. Not so with our latest model, the Killbots, which along with being more effective in all the usual ways, are for more charming and personable. We're told our enemies take great pleasure in getting murdered by them.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryDefenses_Name
StringTable.String: Planetary Defenses

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryDefenses_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to defend our worlds against invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetaryDefenses_Dec
StringTable.String: Fixed facilities to anchor our planetary defense will make our worlds far tougher to invade. They will provide not only defensive firepower, but coordination and structure for the rest of our planetary defenses.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Redoubts_Name
StringTable.String: Redoubts

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Redoubts_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our ability to defend our worlds against invasions.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Redoubts_Dec
StringTable.String: The precise design of the redoubt will be informed by the terrain around it, but its function will always be the same: an impossibly tough defensive structure, with carefully arranged layers of defenses. Few invading forces will be capable of capturing one, and none will enjoy it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SystemsOfControl_Name
StringTable.String: Systems Of Control

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SystemsOfControl_ShortDec
StringTable.String: New tools will allow us to control our aspects of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SystemsOfControl_Dec
StringTable.String: We can hardly control the galaxy if we can't control our own people. Intertwined sets of laws, monitoring systems, and enforcement practices will ensure our people are all behaving properly.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CentralAuthorityOffices_Name
StringTable.String: Central Authority Offices

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CentralAuthorityOffices_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to manage the transportation of goods to and from our worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CentralAuthorityOffices_Dec
StringTable.String: We should be careful not to disperse the power to monitor our people too broadly, lest we lose control over it. Centralized offices can have the equipment and personal necessary to project authority in a place where we can watch those who exercise it.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SecretPolice_Name
StringTable.String: Secret Police

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SecretPolice_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our populace may hate these tactics, but criminals hate them even more.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_SecretPolice_Dec
StringTable.String: Some problems need to disappear quietly, and we shall create a new institution for doing that. Even its existence should do good, reminding those who might be problems not to get too far out of line.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MartialLawDoctrine_Name
StringTable.String: Martial Law Doctrine

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MartialLawDoctrine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks new policies.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_MartialLawDoctrine_Dec
StringTable.String: There's always the risk of pushback on some of our more vigorous monitoring and control techniques. While to date our police forces have been able to deal with this, we should be prepared to issue a stronger response if we need to. The temporary removal of rights will make our people realize just how generous we normally are.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlagueCure_Name
StringTable.String: Synthetic Antibodies

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlagueCure_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Enables exotic cures to artificially created and or plagues that have no known origin.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlagueCure_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ability to combat things that seek to kill us from within has increased over the centuries. Now we have the ability to make AI our ally in the fight against unseen diseases as they now help our immune systems generate novel antibodies to fight infections.
